Module ru.nsu.buzyurkin
Package ru.nsu.buzyurkin.ui

Class SnakeUI

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.buzyurkin.ui.SnakeUI
public class SnakeUI extends Object
Represents the user interface for the Snake game.

  • Constructor Details

    • SnakeUI

      public SnakeUI(int windowWidth, int windowHeight, String windowTitle, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, int fieldCols, int fieldRows)
      Constructs the SnakeUI object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      windowWidth - the width of the window
      windowHeight - the height of the window
      windowTitle - the title of the window
      primaryStage - the primary stage of the JavaFX application
      fieldCols - the number of columns in the game field
      fieldRows - the number of rows in the game field
